name: Dog Adventure Story
description: One day I woke up early in the morning I went to morning walk as usual my daily routine. But this morning this will be some new things bought in my life. I saw 2 small dogs they are moving here and there I started thinking why they are behaving like this. I sit down at one place and observing the dogs what they were doing. After some time, they both get something to eat and they happy with this. Then I have understood that they are hungry and searching for the food.
